item.title: About Me!
item.description: Hello There! My name is Tom or sQzxY and I am a programmer currently studying Computer Science at the University of Hull. This site will be here to showcase my portfolio of projects along with any other relavent artefacts. My Favourite language currently is C#. Here are some ways to find/contact me: here is my GitHub. here is my Twitter. Thanks for coming along.
